original_text: It will be terrible for them! They have lived in the way that Cain lived. They have made the same mistake that Balaam made, because they wanted to get money for themselves. Like Korah, they have refused to obey God. So God will destroy them.
korean_text: 화 있을진저 이 사람들이여, 가인의 길에 행하였으며 삯을 위하여 발람의 어그러진 길로 몰려 갔으며 고라의 패역을 따라 멸망을 받았도다

sentences.original_text: It will be terrible for them!
They have lived in the way that Cain lived.
They have made the same mistake that Balaam made
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 발람이 저지른 것과 같은 실수를 저질렀다.

sentences.original_text: because they wanted to get money for themselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 자신을 위해 돈을 얻고 싶어했기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: Like Korah, they have refused to obey God.
